info.description:
MNIST generator. Trained on digit "3"

z - normal 32
dense layer, in: 32, out: 64
reshape to 4, 4, 4
upscale 2x
conv2d, k3x3, in 4, out 4
relu
upscale 2x
conv2d, k3x3, in 4, out 4
relu
upscale 2x
conv2d, k3x3, in 4, out 4
relu
conv2d 1x1, in 4, out 1
info.name: GAN. Neural network. MNIST

renderpass.name: Common
